::Magmatron::

    He liked what he heard. He dropped the sheilds. "Please,=
 come into my humble abode. I hope we can become good friends."
  ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
  From: Soulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com =

  Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 5:32 PM
  Subject: Re: Destron's have =
a visitor...


  Like-Like, in his beast mode, was partly imune to these sh=
ots, and it would take a number of them to sink through his flabby organics=
, which were very powerful. He hears Magamtron's voice and stops his crashi=
ng. He wiggles around slowly, his mechanics slightly locked up, but his org=
anics working fine. He liked Magmatron's voice, it sounded nice to him. He =
wasn't really very intelligent, but he waited for Magmatron to say somethin=
g else, in the mean time only saying one word:

  Like-Like: Master?...
   =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: dachande 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
    Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 4:54 PM
    Subject: Re: Dest=
ron's have a visitor...


    Sheilds are up.

    ::Magmatron::

        T=
he external defense system came online, and shot at the transformer. It was=
 only a stun. Then Magmatron sent a comm to the bot, it was his policy, you=
 get a warning shot, then a comm, and if you fail to answer or show hostili=
ties then you die.
        "What do you think your doing?!" Magmatron boome=
d. "Cease and desist, or be destroyed."
      ----- Original Message ----- =

      From: Soulstice Omega 
      To: NBW 
      Sent: Wednesday, January=
 31, 2001 11:37 PM
      Subject: Destron's have a visitor...


      Like-=
Like had been traveling in no direction is particular for a long time, and =
had wandered across land and sea until he made it to Northern Maine. He mov=
ed right up to the Destron base. He stopped, he knew there was something ob=
structing his path, and he didn't want to go around it. Like-Like rammed in=
to the base, and:

      1: (If the shields are down) He rammed into it aga=
in and again, howling.

      2: (If the shields are up) He slammed into it=
, was shocked and burnt by the shields, and then repeated this again and ag=
ain, creating a black mark on his flabby slimy skin...




        Yahoo! G=
roups Sponsor 
           
                    www.    
             
     =
